plot outline: The film revolves around Kavitha as she tries to defame the name of a luxurious businessman, who was accused of harassing a woman. After the businessman learns about Kavitha's intentions he decides to play it along, only to get her into trouble.
title: Kurangu Kaila Poo Maalai
plot: The film revolves around Kavitha as she tries to defame the name of a luxurious businessman, who was accused of harassing a woman. After the businessman learns about Kavitha's intentions he decides to play it along, only to get her into trouble.
